Our Process

Move at Startup Speed

Our 4-step process is built for momentum. We keep it lean, focused, and validation-ready so you can launch without delays.

01

Initial Consultation

We kick things off with a quick discovery call to understand your product idea, goals, and user needs. We focus on Discovery Call, Idea Planning, Roadmap Strategy.

Discovery CallIdea PlanningRoadmapStrategy
02

Strategy

We map out features, prioritize what to build first, and align the roadmap around fast validation and clear outcomes.

Our In-House Tool

This is our proprietary planning system to help you get started off the bat. We've perfected it based on hundreds of different projects.

03

Code

We use industry-standard AI tools like Lovable and Cursor to write clean, scalable code faster. Clean, scalable code, supercharged by AI.

MVP IN 14 DAYSAI LEAD DEVELOPMENTSPEED TO MARKET
04

Launch

Once launched, your product is ready to test with users, pitch to investors, or go to market with support from our team along the way. 3x Faster Execution.

FAQs

All your questions, answered

Everything you need to know before building your MVP with us.

Yes, we code everything from scratch using a modern AI-first tech stack: Next.js, Supabase, TailwindCSS, powered by tools like Cursor and Claude Code. We've experimented with low-code platforms before, but they're rarely scalable for real-world products. They also end up being slower to customize, especially when features grow. Thanks to AI, writing code is now faster than ever and gives you clean, scalable, and production-grade results.

Need both? We've got you.

We'll host your custom landing page at yourdomain.com and your app at app.yourdomain.com so you're ready to go from day one.
